title: Got 2 week ban for inting a single game AMA
body:
http://prntscr.com/dgs768

Premades thought it was fun to ban the champ I had hovered as pick intent.

Hit em with the Azir jungle then

http://matchhistory.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUW1/2964302482/202448148?tab=overview

replies.body: you sure showed them! your two week ban will really make them think twice next time.
I don't really care...just didn't feel like letting them just get away with ruining the game for me.
Good job on teaching those stupid fucks a lesson. Keep up the good work summoner, +1.
Thanks homie :)

Seriously? This guy got his champ banned as a joke and you guys are shitting on him. That's 40 minutes of his time with a champion that he was looking forward to play just vanish because his teammates thought it would be "funny." Give this guy a break I'm totally with him on this. I wouldn't have done the same thing but I completely understand where he is coming from.

Should he just shut up and take the abuse in the future?
It's still not acceptable. It's frustrating, yes, but the other 9 players didn't deserve to have a 40 minutes wasted game...
The other 6*. The 3 premades did :)

Must admit that they deserve something shitty. Still, now you are in trouble, which is sad. You must have a good behaviour too haven't been ban after 5'000 games, sadly you lost control on that only time.

I was feeling pissed cause of an argument I had with my gf and I also had the same experience a couple days before where some premades banned my pick intent ("whoops misclick xDDD") so this time I didnt't just wanna take it.

It's alright though...I have other things to do anyway than playing this game and if I miss LoL I still have an NA account and this smurf I am using to post here.

> [{quoted}](name=Jax Cramer,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qBgTfeQK,comment-id=00030000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-08T09:05:09.317+0000)
>
> I was feeling pissed cause of an argument I had with my gf and I also had the same experience a couple days before where some premades banned my pick intent ("whoops misclick xDDD") so this time I didnt't just wanna take it.
> 
> It's alright though...I have other things to do anyway than playing this game and if I miss LoL I still have an NA account and this smurf I am using to post here.

somebody care about your fights with your gf?

it is just ridiculously to bring it up to explain your inting

Nah the inting was because some kids decided they wanna ruin the game for me. This is not the first time it happened though, just the first time I actually did sth "against" it. I usually wouldn't wanna ruin the game for all the other players in the game but since I was in a bad mood in general I just went ahead with it.

Not trying to justify anything though...I deserve to be banned.

People need to stop and think about why he felt compelled to do that. He can't report them for it because it happened during champ select. And.... oh wait, reporting is the only way of punishing unethical behavior so now that he can't do that, what the hell is he supposed to do?

I'm not saying what he did was right. I'm saying he revealed a very serious problem with the current champ select that he was a victim of and now instead of voicing the problem so situations like this don't happen, people are just bashing the victim for doing the only thing he felt he could do to address it.

Should he just shut up and take the abuse in the future?
Sadly, the system is made that way... for now
just dodge? hello? no need to int.. ever.. he deserves the ban

So he gets attacked in champ select, and the right thing to do is dodge and get with a 5 minute penalty, and if this were to happen to a person in ranked queue, a loss. Am I crazy? Am I really the only one who thinks this is totally fucked up???

I'm NOT saying what he did was the "right" thing.

Thats the main reason I didn't wanna dodge...felt bad to just let them get away with ruining my day. People like these to deserve to be inted but since there were 6 other players in the game I feel my ban is deserved.

You are right though that is sad you basically have no other option if you get attacked or trolled in champ select except to just dodge which causes you to lose LP in rankeds or get q penalty.

> [{quoted}](name=Jax Cramer,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qBgTfeQK,comment-id=0003000200000000,timestamp=2016-12-08T09:12:52.756+0000)

> You are right though that is sad you basically have no other option if you get attacked or trolled in champ select except to just dodge which causes you to lose LP in rankeds or get q penalty.

same here i just got banned for doing the same thing
Thanks homie but I also feel I deserve the ban...there should be an option to punish those premades aswell though. It is not the first time it happened to me.
well it can't be just one game cus i int every so often if a 4 man trolls the fuck outta me and i haven't been banned

Well you did actually feed ( Around 0.86 per minute, it's huge ! ). Good thing you got banned. Riot need to be more strict on that kind of behaviour. It's only one game, yes, but people are leaving the game because the community is acting like you are. 

About time Riot ban even after one single game.
Yeah I think its a good thing to see the system is working...didn't expect to be banned for doing it only once in close to 5k games I have played.
You deserve the ban. Ints are scum.

So are premades who try to ruin the game for you.

I agree I deserve it though for ruining the game for the other players.

What else is new. It's all this club crap, it turned everyone into circlejerkers.

They all just wanna make dank memes and get onto Youtube... god forbid they work a fryer.

Inting is the one single thing I hate the most, it should be instant permaban UNLESS in this case it was 4 toxic premade then I could kind of say it was OK, but inting is a childish immature thing to do, I would rather have 50 games of people wishing me cancer (because it doesnt actually mean anything) than 1 game with inting (which actually fucking loses you the game).

inters deserve their bans

those who trashtalk and use slurs in the chat don't

too bad riot bans the latter ones much more readily that the former ones
